title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 28-2.2 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 28-2.2 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Subpart is to establish procedures by
which the department shall evaluate the prior disciplinary history, as defined
in section
28-2.1
of this Subpart, of an
applicant in order to determine whether the applicant is qualified to practice
a licensed profession under title VIII of the Education Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
28-2.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
